Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetugocchaka » 1.6 Nahetusahetukaduka » 1.6.7 Pañhāvāra » 1.6.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 1.6.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Hetugocchaka
Nahetusahetukaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
199.
538Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha satta), nasahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha (sabbattha satta), nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā pañca, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate pañca. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
539Paccanīyaṃ.
